long_description.en: Neon Color is the leading company in Egypt in manufacturing and installing embossed and illuminated letters. We provide innovative solutions for shop, company, and institution signage using the latest technologies. Our specialized team ensures the execution of high-quality embossed letters that professionally reflect your brand identity. We use various materials such as acrylic, stainless steel, and brass to provide options suitable for all tastes and budgets.
